other_tests.findings: Evidence of infiltrating WHO grade II oligodendroglioma with low cellularity.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Histologic features similar to previous specimens, but small nodules of hypercellularity and some mitoses noted during second resection.

other_tests.findings: Presence of a WHO grade II oligodendroglioma infiltrating adjacent white matter.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Higher tumor cellularity and increased Ki-67 proliferation index at the time of second resection.

other_tests.date: At the time of current presentation (not specified)
other_tests.findings: IDH1 R132H mutation and the presence of MGMT gene promoter methylation.

other_tests.findings: Removal of abnormal tissue from the anterior left frontal lobe.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Postoperative MRI showed stable appearance and extent of signal abnormality in adjacent tissues.
